Classes Summary
Class Hit Die Primary Ability Saving Throw Proficiencies Armor and Weapon Proficiencies
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.pvEzGSv71zBhaolc]{Barbarian} d12 Strength Strength & Constitution Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.ILvRZGEx3aXqSVUt]{Bard} d8 Charisma Dexterity & Charisma Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.tlwBnN8GmqJcTgub]{Cleric} d8 Wisdom Wisdom & Charisma Light and medium armor, shields, simple weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.ygVYgPbJkaH0tH1N]{Druid} d8 Wisdom Intelligence & Wisdom Light and medium armor (nonmetal), shields (nonmetal), clubs, daggers, darts, javelins, maces, quarterstaffs, scimitars, sickles, slings, spears
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.ABEBgWyRhVlDUIfq]{Fighter} d10 Strength or Dexterity Strength & Constitution All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.6VoZrWxhOEKGYhnq]{Monk} d8 Dexterity & Wisdom Strength & Dexterity Simple weapons, shortswords
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.gZiUvbXWLs0pOp0c]{Paladin} d10 Strength & Charisma Wisdom & Charisma All armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.VkRQ7glQvTWWiOCS]{Ranger} d10 Dexterity & Wisdom Strength & Dexterity Light and medium armor, shields, simple and martial weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.xEb8jmA5HlNs7xTF]{Rogue} d8 Dexterity Dexterity & Intelligence Light armor, simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.6T08zzKtmmpVwlXU]{Sorcerer} d6 Charisma Constitution & Charisma Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.7WJp9vhi6F6SlAFa]{Warlock} d8 Charisma Wisdom & Charisma Light armor, simple weapons
@Compendium[dnd5e.classes.wZK2Q0rXB0AQo8h3]{Wizard} d6 Intelligence Intelligence & Wisdom Daggers, darts, slings, quarterstaffs, light crossbows
